events.message: We have received the application of the candidate for the software engineer role and will begin reviewing the submitted resume and portfolio.
The candidate’s profile has been categorised under Engineering based on skills listed including software development, APIs, and DevOps experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to handle communication and next steps for this applicant.
Initial screening interview completed over call with the candidate to assess communication skills and confirm software engineering background.
Candidate responded promptly to screening feedback and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the technical interview process.
Technical interview with the lead developer has been scheduled for the candidate on April 18th to further evaluate coding skills and problem-solving.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding abilities and deep understanding of software architecture.
HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and candidate expectations following the technical round.
HR interview completed with positive feedback on candidate’s communication style and alignment with organizational values.
A competitive offer for the software engineer position has been proposed to the candidate, including salary details and joining date.
The candidate has provided affirmative feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, confirming the agreed salary package and the proposed start date for onboarding.
The onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and system access setup for the new software engineer hire.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully with the candidate onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
